original_text: And the altars that were on the top of the upper chamber of Ahaz, which the kings of Judah had made, and the altars which Manasseh had made in the two courts of the house of the Lord, did the king beat down, and brake them down from thence, and cast the dust of them into the brook Kidron.
korean_text: 유다 여러 왕이 아하스의 다락 지붕에 세운 제단들과 므낫세가 여호와의 성전 두 마당에 세운 제단들을 왕이 다 헐고 거기서 빻아내려서 그것들의 가루를 기드론 시내에 쏟아 버리고

sentences.original_text: And the altars that were on the top of the upper chamber of Ahaz
sentences.korean_translation: 아하스의 상층 방 지붕에 있던 제단들을

sentences.original_text: which the kings of Judah had made
and the altars which Manasseh had made
in the two courts of the house of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 여호와의 집 두 마당 안에 있던

sentences.original_text: and brake them down from thence
and cast the dust of them
